meanings.sent1: The elephant was ginormous, taking up the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The cake was ginormous, enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent3: The ginormous teddy bear looked comically out of place in the tiny car.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as ginormous as the sun, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The mountain appeared ginormous, casting a shadow over the valley.

meanings.sent1: The ginormous tree towered over the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The ship was so ginormous that it could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The ginormous sandwich was too big to fit in his lunchbox.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as ginormous as the ocean, vast and deep.
meanings.sent5: The skyscraper was ginormous, reaching up into the clouds.
